sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The conversion of a sinner faithfully translated out of Italian, by M.K. Breefe treatise exhorting sinners to repentance Luis, de Granada, 1504-1588. M. K., fl. 1580.
[2], 85 leaves
printed by Thomas Creede, for I. P[arnell]., London : [1598]
Original title not traced. An edition of Luis de Granada "A breefe treatise exhorting sinners to repentance". Attributed to Luis de Granada on A2r. Reproduction of original in the All Souls College Library, Oxford, England.
=======

printed by Thomas Creede, for I. P[arnell]., London : [1598]
Original title not traced. An edition of Luis de Granada "A breefe treatise exhorting sinners to repentance". Attributed to Luis de Granada on A2r. Reproduction of original in the All Souls College Library, Oxford, England.
I. P[arnell].
Thomas Creede
